item.title: Grass Verge Bollard has been ripped out, 23rd October
item.description:
Matter has not been resolved, putting a road cone there is not a resolution. Furthermore now the whole grass verge has been destroyed by a skip lorry today attending and lifting a skip by parking rear wheels on the verge. This is unacceptable.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bellegrove Road, Falconwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping by rented property at mill place, 23rd October
item.description:
Rented properties down mill place are fly tipping on common again a sign should be put up on lamp post to stop this and residents down their should be inform the common is not for fly tipping your waste should be collected from their own properties not fly tipped on the common.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mill Place, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mill place residents fly tipping again, 23rd October
item.description:
Rented properties down mill place fly tipping on common again a sign should be put up on lamp post to stop this and residents down their should be inform the common is not for fly tipping your waste.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ravenshill, Chislehurst, London

item.title: Street light outside 41/43 Gertrude not working, 23rd October
item.description:
Light not working for at least two weeks this part of the road is in almost total darkness, the only working lights are at the bottom of the street and about half way up , both on the opposite side of the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gertrude Road, Lower Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sinking road, 23rd October
item.description:
This hole is becoming larger and after rain and the road is dry there is still a pool of water remaining. initially the hole was about a foot wide but it is now around 3 to 4 foot wide.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Covert, Crofton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Barrels obstructing road, 23rd October
item.description:
